BioShock Infinite é um presente para os fãs e para os jogadores casuais, que mescla ação e aventura numa dose correta.É uns dos melhores jogos que eu já joguei e com certeza entra no hall de um dos melhores 100 jogos existentes. Mas o que é tudo isso ? 
A saga BioShock em si não é super popular no mundo dos games, mas que jogou recomenda, por causa da construção de história e do desenvolvimento de personagens, nesse vemos o ápice de tudo isso. Você controla Booker na missão de salvar Elizabeth, até aqui você sabe(Ta na sinopse), mas o que não fala é que Elizabeth é o jogo, tudo acontece por causa dela e 95% do carisma do jogo também é por causa dela. Não tem como não apaixonar pela Elizabeth, ao menos você quer ajudar ela, por que se vê o desenvolvimento tremendo da personagem conforme o tempo passa e você fica na pele do Booker se perguntando as mesmas coisas que ele, então você ta em sintonia com o seu personagem, que feito da Irrational em fazer a Elizabeth. 
Mas e o resto do jogo? Se você quiser nem ligar pra História(oq é muito difícil), vai encontrar um jogo muito divertido e frenético, basicamente o jogo todo é você pulando de um lado pro outro atirando em um monte de inimigos variados, que exigem tratamento diferente. É muito divertido, a capacidade de usar poderes(Marca da Saga BioShock) e de controlar o cenário, dá pra preparar tudo antes de sair atirando por ai, claro que tudo precisa de estratégia se não você vai morrer muitas vezes. O stealth é quase inexistente com certeza não é a proposta do jogo então nada de dishonored. 
CONCLUSÃO:
História: 10/10( De explodir a cabeça)
Gameplay: 10/10
Duração: 10/10
Gráficos: 9/10 (Muito bons pra época)
Total: 9.9/10
probably the best BioShock game

This was one of the games that I really looked forward to when I got a computer that could play it. I guess my expectations were too high because I was slightly disappointed especially in how it tied up the Bioshock franchise so far. It's still a very solid experience nonetheless and since this comes as part of the Bioshock collection it's definitely worth it.
Great game weird ending

Вся серия игр BioShock заслуживает особо внимания со стороны общества.
Прекрасным представителем этой серии по праву является BioShock Infinite, который по прохождении просто взрывает мозг своей увлекательностью. Но, прежде чем приступить к прохождению этой игры, требуется пройти первую часть биошока, так как именно с этой частью непосредственно связан инфинит своими дополнениями.
Покупать нужно строго с season pass`ом, так как докупать отдельно каждое дополнение выйдет в копеечку.
Проходить нужно с русской озвучкой - это стоит того, хотя слышать на оригинале "Wake Up, Mister Dewitt" просто завораживает.
Сюжет просто восхитительный, но чтобы его понять необходимо пройти игру несколько раз с дополнениями. 
Однозначно советую к покупке.

This is a magnificent, marvelous game, a true piece of art. I also wouldn't have expected this game to be 7 years old by now. It might be due to the time in which the game is set out, but I would argue that the aesthetics and atmosphere make the game pretty much timeless. In case it would not be clear, the game takes place in the skies rather than in Rapture, but apart from that, gameplay is exactly what you would expect from a Bioshock title.

One thing that I especially would like to mention is how well music has been used throughout the game. The general soundtrack is great, but there were a few scenes that really gave me goosebumps. Even if you are not entirely into the shoot & loot genre of games, these cut-scenes and the general story telling might be enough to advise this game to anyone who likes games.

Bilgisayar da başlayıp konsol da bitirdiğim bir oyun ve bu oyun bir harikaaa gelin inceleyelim

Artıları
+Hikayesi muazzam bu hikaye ile ilgili söyleyebileceğim tek şey bu muazzam 
+Harika yazılmış karakterler ekip karakterler için her şeyi düşünmüş adeta 
+Savaş mekanikleri efsane vuruş hissi olsun çevre etkileşimi olsun vigor kullanımı olsun her şey yerli yerinde 
+Oyun görsellik olarak inanılmaz ötesi bir iş çıkarıyor 
+Columbia yaşıyor ve oyun size bunu çok güzel bir şekil de aktarıyor 
+DLCler de ki Rapture şehri bile ince ince çalışılmış
+İnanılmaz ötesi bir sonu var
+Silah çeşitliliği iyi
+Vigor (özel güç) çeşitliliği güzel
+Vigor kullanması eğlenceli
+Sky hook ile savaşlar gayet eğlenceli ve dinamik hale geliyor
+Bu artıyı spoiler olur diye yazmıyorum oynayınca anlarsınız :)
+Yaptığınız upgrade leri bariş şekilde hissediyorsunuz
+Takipçi karakteri olan Elizabeth size ayak bağı olmuyor 
+Elizabeth karakteri yanınızda iken gerçek bir insan gibi davranıyor
+Oyunun müzikleri harika ötesi  

Eksiler
-Oyunun ana düşmanı Comstock ile çok az karşılaşıyoruz 
- 1-2 oynanışa etki etmeyen glitch

100/100

Bu oyunu 2 kere almış biri olarak şunu rahatlıkla söyleyebilirim ki bu oyunu oynayın oyun Efsane ingilizce anlamıyorsanız
oyunun pc için Türkçe yaması da var.

Perfetta evoluzione dei precedenti Bioshock che, nonostante non siano imprescindibili per capire la trama di questo capitolo, li consiglio caldamente. Questo titolo è incentrato sullo svolgersi della trama incentrata su Elisabet la ragazza che vi accompagnerà per quasi tutto il gioco. Il titolo è uno sparatutto in soggettiva dove spesso la forza bruta è la migliore strategia. Per coloro che hanno giocato i primi capitoli consiglio caldamente di giocarsi il titolo direttamente a modalità difficile.

Just finished  for the second time 7 years after releasing date. If you havent played yet, yes it is still playable.

I love how bioshock evolved into faster, chaotic combat system compared to bioshock 1 and 2. 
Fighting with large group of enemies by using various combination of plasmids and guns were fun. Since, we were dealing with large number of enemies we were also consuming resources very fast. But game dealt with this issue very well by placing at least required amount of resources around and even letting Elizabeth to supply player automatically. This feature really connects players who do not like looting much to game. 
Variety of guns and plasmids makes player able to choose own playing style but if player does not stick with a few of them their variety might become overwhelming after mid-game.
Zip-line mechanic is geniously placed into game, adds variation into combat and makes player able to fully experiance atmosphere.

There is nothing much to say for story telling and atmosphere of the Bioshock Infinite. Its one of the best examples of its kind. Every corner of this game is designed diligently. This game is not teliing you story with only dialogues, characters. World around you is builded very detailed and demonstrates something about story. I am very happy to see a action-shooting game with a very rich story.

As of writing this review, I have completed the main campaign. It was quite good, even though it doesn't take place in Rapture, like the previous two. Without giving too much away, I would say that the story is more "out there" than the others (which is saying something).

Also, this game doesn't have problems with crashes, unlike the previous two.

[spoiler] I'm still confused by the ending, but I'm going to try 1999 mode, DLC, and researching fan theories to help me understand. [/spoiler]

I know I'm pretty late to the party, but damn, this game's good! 

I bought the whole trilogy not long ago, and finished the first two installments only a few weeks back, and boy, what a ride it's been... [i]BioShock[/i] is a true masterpiece, [i]BioShock 2[/i] is a fun sequel, and [i]BioShock Infinite[/i] is on a whole different level. Mesmerizing graphics, a really impressive story (although, I must admit, I wasn't a huge fan of the ending, but that's just me), engaging characters, especially Elizabeth, of course, and I even enjoyed the two [i]Burial at Sea[/i] DLCs, [spoiler]specifically because I got to return to Rapture! I don't know why, but somehow I found the dark, claustrophobic corridors of Rapture much more exciting than any of the horrors of Columbia.[/spoiler]

I've read some reviews that the gameplay is not as unique and revolutionary as in the first game, and while that might be true, it doesn't change the fact that this is a brilliant, wonderful shooter that also carries very important messages about religion and xenophobia. The only thing I didn't like at all was the first DLC, [i]Clash in the Clouds[/i], which, for me, was rather frustrating thanks to its blue ribbon challenges and the few glitches I experienced while playing it. In the end I didn't even bother trying to finish it.

All in all, highly recommended, especially if you played and loved the first [i]BioShock[/i]!

Jsem obrovský fanoušek Bioshocku a když jsem se dozvěděl že nový bioshock bud jinde než v Rapture upřímně jsem se bál. Díky bohu můžu říct že se 3 díl této série opravdu povedl. Nebudu vypisovat celý děj protože je velmi složitý a nejspíše až hru dohrajete budete velmi zmatení, nebojte se. Na první průchod jsem celý děj také nepochopil, avšak to zas tak nevadí protože děj je briliatní a to jak se postavy v průběhu hry vyvíjejí je neuvěřitelné. Záporáci a zvraty ve hře jsou moc hezky udělané a na konci hry skončíte s otevřenou pusou. Bojový systém je zábavný, je zde velká škála zbraní, ADAMA a i jiných způsobů jak vaše nepřátele zabít a celkově je bojový systém velmi zábavný. Hratelnost byla v předešlých dílech trochu jednotvárná což u Infinite neplatí. Celkově Infinite zlepšuje mínusy minulých dílů, avšak atmosféra Rapture zde lehce chybí chybí. 9.5/10.

剧情太棒了，无数的伏笔和铺垫让故事十分精巧细腻，最后一段揭示谜题也精彩无比。
游戏美术风格堪称业界翘楚，天空之城哥伦比亚有着晴天的磅礴和夜晚的神秘，游戏中笼罩在云雾中或在闪电的一刹那显现的巨型雕像反乌托邦味十足。
伊丽莎白的塑造简直完美，为什么一代就没有这样的NPC呢，明明海底城那阴郁压抑让玩家一个人孤独探索几个小时会几乎崩溃。
